summary:
Confirm Buy - Buy now, get a 100% refund if you change your mind within 21 days, plus 10% pro-rata from holders who bought during that time.

 $CHAD Staking - Instructions: (1) Stake ETH, (2) Unstake within 21 days (3) Repeat, (4) Claim past rewards at any time.

 BuyStake - Buying: currently 10% discount vs. market price, until cap fills. Refunds & Staking: Buy now, get a 100% refund if you change your mind within 21 days, plus 10% pro-rata from holders who bought during that time.
